body.text:
1. Login to below server & add your ssh keys: 

 ssh -D 33333 vcidev@jump.aws-vpc-bglnammamane.phx.cisco.com 

 Password  password4Lusers! 

 File: /home/vcidev/.ssh/authorized_keys 

 Use ‘vim’, add your keys at the end and save it.
5.Replace lab-socks.json files in respective CUE & CMA folders

cd …/ctap/cue 

 NODE_ENV=lab-socks NODE_CONFIG_DIR=./etc/ node --inspect server.js 

 cd …/ctap/cma 

 NODE_ENV=lab-socks NODE_CONFIG_DIR=./etc/ node server.js
3) Install sqlite3 module in tests,cue and cma folders

npm sqlite3 

 cd ../cma 

 npm sqlite3 

 cd ../cue 

 npm sqlite3
